instructions: Stand up straight with a barbell in your hands, palms facing forward.
Perform 7 repetitions of the bottom half of a bicep curl (from full extension to 90 degrees).
Perform 7 repetitions of the top half of a bicep curl (from 90 degrees to full contraction).
Perform 7 repetitions of the full range of motion bicep curl.
Do not rest between the segments. This completes one set.
